summary: After numerous attempts at suicide fail, a couple decide to live it up and then kill themselves on New Year's Day.
cast: Priyanka Chopra|Ranbir Kapoor|Aubrey K. Miller|Pooja Kumar|Carl Marino|Kumar Pallana|Zayed Khan|Ilona Marino|Edward Sonnenblick|Adrian Bustamante|Tanvi Azmi|Joy Sengupta|Vishal Malhotra|Sucheta Khanna|Nakul Kamte|Laurie Folkes|Harry Mearing|Ryan Harpole|Zach Mami|Daniela Mercado|Sabrina Schaumburg|Jade Haviland|Anil Mehta|Sudip Chatterjee|Sina Hajhassan|Shaun Webb|Dan Herman|Stephanie Aguilar|Kenneth Mearing|Sophia Revelli|Andrew Mearing|David Firefly|Marcus Hinton|Roni Mazumdar|Damien Metz|Rajeev Pahuja|Jeremiah Turner
title: Anjaana Anjaani
